text: @SenSchumer It's May 16th & 5000 seniors R dead under UR leadership (& @NYGovCuomo) when they were sent 2 nursing homes after being tested + 4 #Coronavirus when there were 4000 beds available (thanks 2 @realDonaldTrump) 4 infected citizens...by the way...only 1200 of those beds were utilized https://t.co/2gUCgGZXI5
